item.title: Wetshaving Server Discussion
item.description: /c/Wetshaving Server Discussion on sub.wetshaving.social [home] [/c/ws_server_discussion ðŸŒŽ] [sub.wetshaving.social] Description The purpose of this community is for members of the sub.wetshaving.social community to discuss issues and ask questions about the server. All sitewide rules apply. In general, any posts by users not from the sub.wetshaving.social Lemmy or posts not about the server will be removed. Details Activity Count Subscribers 31 Posts 3 Comments 7 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 4 Monthly Active Users 4 Activity Date Published 2023-06-10 20:26:33 Updated 1969-12-31 19:00:00 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:18

item.title: WetShaving
item.description: /c/WetShaving on sub.wetshaving.social [home] [/c/wetshaving ðŸŒŽ] [sub.wetshaving.social] Description This is a community of enthusiasts, hobbyists and artisans who enjoy a traditional wet shave: brush, soap, and safety or straight razor. We are a part of the /r/WetShaving community found on Reddit, Discord, and IRC, and the wetshaving.social Mastodon instance. **Community Rules** Rule 1 - Behaviour and Etiquette -Be Respectful. Do not bully, flame, or harass others. -Malicious comments are not allowed but heated discussion and salty banter is okay.

item.title: The Shave Bazaar
item.description: /c/The Shave Bazaar on sub.wetshaving.social [home] [/c/shave_bazaar ðŸŒŽ] [sub.wetshaving.social] Description 1. Tag your post in the title. The approved tags are as follows: [WTS] Want to Sell [WTB] Want to Buy [WTT] Want to Trade [WTG] Want to Give [WTS/WTT] Want to Sell or Trade [Vendor] Provider of goods and services through their own site [Service] Honing, restoration, sensual massage... [Artisan] You make your own goods by hand and you think you're fancy
